# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the axis.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get set }
```

## Specifying the title

- **attributedTitle**: An attributed version of the axis title.

items.description: An attributed version of the axis title.
items.name: attributedTitle

title: title
